ComicInfo.Summary: As the snow begins to melt and the harshest winter in Marshville's history comes to a close, the towns people begin to dig themselves out with a new hope. But even as everybody celebrates their good fortune, a bigger and even deadlier threat descends upon their isolated town. Somewhere in the wilderness surrounding Marshville lurks a creature of unnatural ferocity and power. Rumors spread of the creature being a werewolf. As the frozen snows recede, the countless bones of the creatures previous victims begin to reveal themselves. If Meriem can't destroy the monster, the future of Marshville looks bleak.
